Reviews.Title: beware of the weight of the wire
Reviews.Author: henryford
Reviews.Content: I ordered the wire only to find out that its not good for electrical area's, Has a copper clad Aluminum center core  and will probably break at low temps if moved in minus degree's due to the aluminum center core. otherwise it works well in open area's where there is no movement of the wire or electrical interference. Good copper wire weighs around 30 lbs /500 ft.  this weighs 19 lbs/500 ft..

ProductInfo.Name: Evertech 500 Feet CCTV Security Camera Coax Siamese Video + Power Cable RG59 Black ISO
